verses.name: Ezekiel 45:22
verses.text: And upon that day shall the prince prepare for himself and for all the people of the land a bullock for a sin offering.

verses.name: Ezekiel 45:23
verses.text: And seven days of the feast he shall prepare a burnt offering to the Lord, seven bullocks and seven rams without blemish daily the seven days; and a kid of the goats daily for a sin offering.

verses.name: Ezekiel 45:24
verses.text: And he shall prepare a meat offering of an ephah for a bullock, and an ephah for a ram, and an hin of oil for an ephah.
